hero.title: Gaming Tournament Platform
hero.subtitle: Create, join and manage your video game tournaments with ease

platformIntro.title: Oxymore is a competitive esports platform built for gamers who want more ‚Äî more tournaments,
platformIntro.span: more stats, more glory. Whether you‚Äôre a solo player or part of a team, dive into the action and rise through the ranks.

leagues.title: Select Your League. See the Best.
leagues.subtitle: Choose a league to view top performing teams.
leagues.desc: Each league offers a unique competitive experience. Climb the ranks and prove your worth!

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Oxymore

items.question: How do I join a tournament?
items.answer: Create an account, head to the Tournaments section, and click ‚ÄúJoin‚Äù on any active event. You can play solo or with your squad.

items.question: Is it free to participate?
items.answer: Yes! Participation is free for all registered users.

items.question: Can I track my stats and performance?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our platform provides detailed stats and performance tracking.

items.question: How are teams ranked?
items.answer: Teams are ranked based on their Elo score, match results, and activity.

items.question: What happens if my team doesn‚Äôt show up?
items.answer: If your team doesn‚Äôt show up for a match, it may result in an automatic forfeit or penalty.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.content: Oxymore revolutionizes video game tournament organization by offering a complete and intuitive platform for players, organizers and developers.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.content: We believe everyone should be able to organize and participate in quality tournaments, regardless of their technical expertise level.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of technology to improve user experience.

community.title: Community
community.description: We build a strong and inclusive community of gaming enthusiasts.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our platform.

team.title: The Minds Behind Oxymore
team.intro: Our diverse team brings together expertise from gaming, technology, design, and community building to create something truly special.

members.name: Alex Chen
members.description: Former pro gamer turned entrepreneur, Alex has been in the esports industry for over 10 years.

members.name: Sarah Kim
members.description: Tech enthusiast with a passion for building scalable platforms that connect gamers worldwide.

members.name: Marcus Rodriguez
members.description: Creative director with 15+ years experience in gaming UI/UX and brand development.

2020.title: 2020 - The Beginning
2020.desc: Founded by a group of passionate gamers who saw the potential for a better esports platform.

2021.title: 2021 - First Launch
2021.desc: Released our beta platform with basic tournament functionality and community features.

2022.title: 2022 - Growth & Innovation
2022.desc: Expanded to support multiple games, introduced advanced analytics, and reached 10K users.

2023.title: 2023 - Global Expansion
2023.desc: Launched in new markets, introduced mobile app, and partnered with major esports organizations.

2024.title: 2024 - The Future
2024.desc: Continuing to innovate with AI-powered features, VR integration, and blockchain technology.

cta.title: Ready to Join the Revolution?
cta.desc: Be part of the future of esports. Create your account today and start competing in tournaments, building your team, and climbing the ranks.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Have a question, issue, or just want to say hi? We're here to help you with anything related to Oxymore and our tournaments.

resources.subtitle: Find all the essential assets, guides, and support to make the most of Oxymore.

brandAssets.title: Brand Assets

integrationGuides.title: Integration Guides
integrationGuides.desc: Step-by-step guides to integrate Discord bots, widgets, and more.

pressKit.title: Press Kit
pressKit.desc: Find press releases, company info, and media resources for journalists.

support.title: Support
support.desc: Need help? Contact our team for fast support.
